text: There are only 2 queue number (Loan Counter) in front of me, but sadly i waited for 60mins, when the next turn to me, i was being hijacked by one of the customer who escorted by the service crew to check something on mailing address issue (without queue no.). I waited another round of 15mins but no luck on my turn. End of the day i was not able to complete my task for the trip whereby i waited for 75mins and being hijacked. have to educate the staff on the important of the queue system.

This has to be the worst branch I've ever been in! So many counters and only 3 were open. There were only two people in front of my number and I waited for an hour. One hour! Not moving at all! What the hell is going on? I saw one of the counters with a lady sitting over there but never do anything just open? ocbc can you please look at this issue straight on? Don't waste everyone's time. Time is precious. Understand?

I cannot under why this OCBC bank take so long time just to service the customers poor service. ðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘Ž some more is business Q also wait for so long omg 4 counter but only 1 or 2 is moving other 2 not moving. Wait for more than 1.30 plus unbelievable

Hi,

I just couldn't believe the service level provided one of a few top banking provider in SG

The service hours mention 12noon closes and I was there by 11.05am on Saturday, 29 March 2025.

Customer service staff need help to improve on the CSR.

I was told banking hall closed, due to many customers.

My questions

1. I was here at the banking area 11
05am, How would I know there were many customers ?

I travel all the way to the bank from the Western part of SG and was told is closed " before 12noon. "

Every customers to be service if arrived before 12noon or you close the banking at 10am.

Suggestting the officer in charge to have a look at the processes.

Below satisfactory.

Sorry and disappointed.

I would like to extend my special thanks to Mr. Chin Yu Keat. He has been an incredible help in assisting me with opening my bank account. His patience and professionalism were truly appreciated throughout the process. Thank you once again, Mr. Chin, for your exceptional support and service.
